thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Kohn Creative
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Kohn Creative

author: Kohn Creative
title: Kohn Creative
text:
We were walked through the alignment process with Aaron from Boss Laser. He was patient and very descriptive.
We had a local tech (not associated with Boss Laser) align our cutter before we called, but our results after working with Aaron far exceed the results we got from an in-person local technician.
Thanks for helping us get out machine working smoothly!
